client_profile: A couple looking to buy an apartment in Brussels. Budget ranges from 490,000 to 895,000 EUR. Priorities include cafes, restaurants, and parks in a quiet residential area.
must_have: Access to parks and green areas
red_flags: High noise levels in some districts
contradictions: Desire for quiet areas may limit cafe options
Budget constraints may restrict location choice
Preference for modern amenities versus older buildings

top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Irradiates a lively atmosphere with diverse eateries and coffee options around.
Parc Tenbosch provides ample space for leisurely strolls and relaxation.
watch_out: Hustle and bustle can lead to noise disturbances in popular spots.

top_districts.name: Uccle
why: Uccle provides lush parks and quiet streets, ideal for families.
Parc Brugmann offers serene walking paths, perfect for outdoor leisure.
